title: Ukraine claims 410 bodies found in recaptured towns; Zelenskyy accuses Russia of genocide. Follow our live updates
content:
1. Ukraine claims 410 bodies found in recaptured towns; Zelenskyy accuses Russia of genocide. Follow our live updates  CNBC
  2. Ukrainian President Zelensky's spokesperson describes apparent war crimes by Russia - BBC News  BBC News
  3. NATO chief calls Bucha executions ‘horrific’  The Hill
  4. Bodies of 'executed people' strewn across street in Bucha as Ukraine accuses Russia of war crimes  CNN
  5. Ukraine accuses Russia of massacre, city strewn with bodies  POLITICO
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ウクライナ、奪還した町で410体の遺体を発見と主張 ゼレンスキーはロシアを大量虐殺と非難。ライブアップデートをフォローする
乌克兰称在收复的城镇发现410具尸体；泽伦斯基指责俄罗斯进行种族灭绝。关注我们的实时更新
烏克蘭稱在收復的城鎮發現410具屍體；澤倫斯基指責俄羅斯進行種族滅絕。關注我們的實時更新
